1370: Hildegardis was born in Cromme straet in 1370.
Got married to Cesarius at age 20 in 1370.
Gave birth to Ghela in 1370 at age 20.
1371: Gave birth to Imsoete in 1371 at age 21.
1372: Gave birth to Riet in 1372 at age 22.
Lost daughter Imsoete when Imsoete was 2 years old.
1374: Gave birth to Oda in 1374 at age 24.
1375: Gave birth to Heinone in 1375 at age 25.
1376: Gave birth to Firiin in 1376 at age 26.
1378: Gave birth to Hodine in 1378 at age 28.
1379: Gave birth to Salome in 1379 at age 29.
1382: Lost son Wicghard when Wicghard was 0 years old.
Gave birth to stillborn Wicghard in 1382 at age 32.
1384: Gave birth to Sywi in 1384 at age 34.
1385: Lost daughter Oda when Oda was 12 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1395: Lost daughter Sywi when Sywi was 12 years old.
